lines.text: Yes sir. Those were dummy charges on the hull of this ship. If they hadn't been dummies, you'd be on the bottom now sir, for the duration.
Spare a penny for the diver sir!
Hey, that's an idea - how do you spend a penny in this contraption?
Well boys, we're on our way. Let's pop in quick, blow her sky-high, and home in time for bed, eh?
When we hear that bang well bail out, and not before!
Got a battleship on it - that's why!

[of the Captain of the Tirpitz]
I 'ope 'e's got a smashin' sense of humour!
